overview: To get into the mess and fuck in the wreckage.  To give over to pure physical sensation and stare into the void of atrocity, oblivion. The body as machine - like a crashed car - of both powerful possibility and freedom and impotent, crumpled failure.  Pain and pleasure heightened by the tension pulling at our own survival instinct.
tagline: "these wounds formed the key to a new sexuality, born from a perverse technology"
title: Crash
